html:
News

Written By
Cristina Anderca
Published
4/4/25

Watch A MINECRAFT MOVIE in a theater near you

A MINECRAFT MOVIE is officially out in theaters! Embark on an adventure that has it all: a ragtag group of misfits, a mysterious blocky world, angry hordes of piglins, and of course, Steve! How will our heroes fare in the Overworld? Will they ever get back home? And how will they deal with the minor ordeal of a piglin plot to conquer the Overworld? Grab your ticket, snatch the biggest bucket of popcorn you can handle, and find out! 

GET TICKETS: UNITED STATES | INTERNATIONAL 

In case you need a refresher, here’s the latest and greatest trailer for A MINECRAFT MOVIE: 

Free in-game content 

To celebrate A MINECRAFT MOVIE, we’ve partnered up with Warner Bros. Pictures to create some thrilling (and completely free!) in-game content* so you can adventure beyond the silver screen. Get it all at Minecraft Marketplace! 

A MINECRAFT MOVIE DLC 

Enter the arcade and compete in elytra races, survive the night, and sneak into a woodland mansion! Play iconic moments from the film in A MINECRAFT MOVIE DLC and see if you can reach the top of the leaderboard, whether you bring along friends or play with the heroes from the movie. 

A MINECRAFT MOVIE ADD-ON 

Wield powerful weapons and fight vicious piglins from the movie in this free add-on. Equip the potato launcher, buck-chuckets, and more, then face the Piglin General, the Great Hog, and a host of other foes.  

LAVA CHICKEN ADD-ON 

Steve’s (in)famous recipe from the movie is also available for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition! Cook the chicken and grab a bite to turn up the heat and leave a... spicy trail for your foes. Can you win the battle before the heat overwhelms you?  

A MINECRAFT MOVIE: HERO PACK 

Will you lovingly tame wolves as Dawn or build your own Chicken Shack as Steve? No matter what type of adventurer you are, there’s a hero and skin to suit your playstyle. 

FREE WALLPAPER

A MINECRAFT MOVIE isn’t just for the silver screen! Bring the adventure to your small, medium, and big screens with a free wallpaper. Simply go here to choose your screen size or download the entire set by clicking the button below. 

DOWNLOAD HERE 

We couldn’t be more excited for you to finally see A MINECRAFT MOVIE! We hope you have fun seeing the Overworld through a new lens and enjoy the ride together with Steve, Garrett, Dawn, Natalie, and Henry. And remember, always bring a water bucket! 

* Requires Internet, a valid Microsoft account, and Minecraft: Bedrock Edition (sold separately). Geography limitations, country and balance restrictions, taxes, platform-specific online subscription requirements and Internet connection fees may apply. Add-on, skin pack, and DLC are available on Minecraft Marketplace until 12/31/2025.
